synopsis.text:
After a life of hardship and an untimely death, 39-year-old Ryouma Takebayashi is granted a second chance by three compassionate deities. Reincarnated as a young boy in a magical realm, Ryouma is bestowed with extraordinary physical abilities and an affinity for all elements. Tasked with a simple mission to enjoy life, he finds solace in the unusual hobby of researching and taming slimes.

Living in a secluded forest, Ryouma spends three blissful years perfecting his magical skills and cultivating an extraordinary array of slimes. Despite his contentment, a hint of loneliness lingers, as he yearns for human interaction. His life takes a turn when he aids an injured traveler, leading him to join a group headed to meet a duke's family.

Embarking on a journey beyond his forest home, Ryouma's unique talents as a magic user and slime tamer draw admiration and surprise. Adapted from Roy's light novel, "By the Grace of the Gods," this tale follows Ryouma's adventures in a world filled with monsters, knights, and magic, as he explores the wonders of his new life under the watchful eyes of the three gods.
